function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global reduction in oil and natural gas demand due to COVID-19.","Impact":"Losses incurred by oil sectors, decreased competitiveness, and problems with production equipment access and costs.","Mitigation":"Diversification of energy sources, investment in renewable energy, and strategic demand management.","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, demand forecasting and management tools, and energy efficiency solutions.","People":"Oil and natural gas producers, energy market stakeholders, and national energy authorities.","Owner":"Government energy agencies, energy companies, and international organizations."}]}
